title: The life of Alfred, or, Alvred: the first institutor of subordinate government in this kingdome, and refounder of the Vniversity of Oxford Together with a parallell of our soveraigne lord, K. Charles untill this yeare, 1634. By Robert Povvell of Wels, one of the Society of New-Inne.
author: Powell, Robert, fl. 1636-1652.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Richard Badger for Thomas Alchorn, and are to be sold at the signe of the green-Dragon in Pauls Church-yard,
